METADATA.DESCRIPTION: This file contains NTCIR-7 MOAT Simplified Chinese testing topics.

TOPIC.TITLE: “911”恐怖袭击后美国经济发生了什么变化？
TOPIC.DESC: What happened to the American economy after the 911 terrorist attacks?
请说说“911”恐怖袭击后美国经济发生了什么变化？。

TOPIC.TITLE: 各国对洛克比空难的反应。
TOPIC.DESC: I would like to know the responses of other countries to Lockerbie Air Disaster.
请说说各国对洛克比空难的反应。

TOPIC.TITLE: 关于科索沃战争中的暴行、军事干涉、独立申明以及其他任何与之有关的事情。
TOPIC.DESC: Please tell me about the Cosovo civil war, theviolence that it has caused, any military interventions that have taken placebecause of it, their Declaration of Independence, and anything elsethat has happened because of the Cosovo civil war.
请说说关于科索沃战争中的暴行、军事干涉、独立申明以及其他任何与之有关的事情。

TOPIC.TITLE: 尼泊尔统治家族（王室）事变的背景和详情以及后继的来自各方的反应。
TOPIC.DESC: I would like to know about the background and details of the incident with Nepal's ruling family (royalty) and the response thatcame afterwards.
请说说尼泊尔统治家族（王室）事变的背景和详情以及后继的来自各方的反应。

TOPIC.TITLE: 针对印尼华人的暴力事件。
TOPIC.DESC: Please tell me about the incident of violence against Chinese Indonesian people.
请说说针对印尼华人的暴力事件。

TOPIC.TITLE: 美国政府起诉微软垄断行为，需知道该诉讼的内容、该案例的事实、和解过程以及最后的判决。
TOPIC.DESC: Please tell me about the lawsuit that the American Government brought against Microsoft for monopolistic practices. I want to know the content of the lawsuit, facts about the case, settlements, and decisions that were made.
请说说美国政府起诉微软垄断行为，需知道该诉讼的内容、该案例的事实、和解过程以及最后的判决。

TOPIC.TITLE: 各国已经进行的核武器试验。
TOPIC.DESC: Please tell me about nuclear weapons tests that have been carried out by various countries.
请说说各国已经进行的核武器试验。

TOPIC.TITLE: 叙利亚对中东和平进程的立场。
TOPIC.DESC: What is the position of Syria with regard to the Middle East peace process?
请说说叙利亚对中东和平进程的立场。

TOPIC.TITLE: 美国在线（AOL）和网景（Netscape）的关系是什么？
TOPIC.DESC: What is the relationship between AOL and Netscape?
请说说美国在线（AOL）和网景（Netscape）的关系是什么？

TOPIC.TITLE: 什么是厄尔尼诺？
TOPIC.DESC: What is El Nino?
请说说什么是厄尔尼诺？

TOPIC.TITLE: 中俄之间发生的事情。
TOPIC.DESC: Please tell me about what happened between China and Russia.
请说说中俄之间发生的事情。

TOPIC.TITLE: 什么是温室气体？
TOPIC.DESC: What are greenhouse gasses?
请说说什么是温室气体？

TOPIC.TITLE: 北约和波兰是什么关系？
TOPIC.DESC: What is the relationship between the NATO and Poland?
请说说北约和波兰是什么关系？

TOPIC.TITLE: 泰国在亚洲经济危机中的角色及其对世界经济的影响，同时各国针对这次危机所采取的步骤。
TOPIC.DESC: Please tell me about the roles that Thailand played in the Asian economic crisis and what impact that has had on the world economy, as well as the steps that various countries have taken in light of the crisis.
请说说泰国在亚洲经济危机中的角色及其对世界经济的影响，同时各国针对这次危机所采取的步骤。
